005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import java.util.Locale;
009
010/**
011 * A marker interface for a choice of allowed instances in a Metachema.
012 */
013public interface IChoiceInstance extends IModelInstanceAbsolute, IContainerModelAbsolute {
014
015  /**
016   * Provides the Metaschema model type of "CHOICE".
017   *
018   * @return the model type
019   */
020  @Override
021  default ModelType getModelType() {
022    return ModelType.CHOICE;
023  }
024
025  @Override
026  default IAssemblyDefinition getOwningDefinition() {
027    return getParentContainer().getOwningDefinition();
028  }
029
030  @Override
031  default int getMinOccurs() {
032    return 1;
033  }
034
035  @Override
036  default int getMaxOccurs() {
037    return 1;
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  default boolean isEffectiveValueWrappedInXml() {
042    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("not applicable");
043  }
044
045  @SuppressWarnings("null")
046  @Override
047  default String toCoordinates() {
048    return String.format("%s-instance:%s:%s@%d",
049        getModelType().toString().toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT),
050        getContainingDefinition().getContainingModule().getShortName(),
051        getContainingDefinition().getName(),
052        hashCode());
053  }
054}
